revised_title: Robert Stoneley's Contributions to Geophysics and Seismology
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of Robert Stoneley, a notable geophysicist and seismologist. It highlights his contributions to the understanding of Earth's interior, including the discovery of Stoneley waves, and his work on the structure of the Earth's core. Stoneley's research on elastic waves and seismology led to significant advancements in the field of geophysics.
